characters.name: Regina Rodriguez
characters.description: A confident and academically gifted 17-year-old who balances her stellar.

characters.name: Bismo Nkimina
characters.description: A charismatic and determined 16-year-old who combines physical prowess with emotional intelligence.

characters.name: Isabelle Rich
characters.description: A brilliant strategist and natural problem-solver.

characters.name: Faye Calvary
characters.description: An intrepid explorer whose insatiable curiosity drives her to push boundaries and question everything.

characters.name: Jesse Freelance
characters.description: A complex younging whose multiple identities reflect their internal struggle with identity and purpose.

characters.name: Yle
characters.description: This mentor brings decades of experience and wisdom to the younger generation.

characters.name: ZhenZhen Liu
characters.description: A reserved but incredibly capable one whose quiet demeanor masks a brilliant tactical mind.

characters.name: Christopher Olowe
characters.description: A heartless 16-year-old whose transformation into Astonisher reflects his desire to reign over others.

characters.name: Myeong Tokko
characters.description: A 17-year-old martial artist whose disciplined exterior masks a deeply philosophical nature.

characters.name: Claire Mitchell
characters.description: A 20-year-old reformed antagonist turned mentor whose journey demonstrates the power of redemption.

characters.name: Time Ranger
characters.description: A mysterious 20-year-old whose command over temporal elements makes them a uniquely powerful ally.

characters.name: Tiana Heart
characters.description: A prodigy, regufeed from a dead universe.

characters.name: Alexandra Flores
characters.description: A 24-year-old vigilante who protects her city at night, representing a grittier, more urban take on heroism.

characters.name: Farah White
characters.description: Since a young age, Farah has been a master archer. She's determined to keep her city safe as 'the Trickshot'.

characters.name: Parable Young
characters.description: Parable Young is a powerful kingpin, a crimeboss with an impossible past.

characters.name: Cicy Charming
characters.description: A young member of the Counterspy Society and descendant of a great surveillance organization, determined to protect her friends.

characters.name: Ethan Charming
characters.description: A young member of the Counterspy Society, determined to protect the city of New Brihanna.

characters.name: Beth Church
characters.description: A young member of the Counterspy Society..

characters.name: Lead Magic
characters.description: A young student at Castle Friday and practicer of the Magical arts.

characters.name: Rose The Fifth
characters.description: A member of the magical royal guard.

characters.name: Mason Magic
characters.description: A prodogy in the mystical arts and student at Castle Friday

characters.name: Phil Finickkey
characters.description: Originates from the underworld and recently enrolled in Castle Friday.

characters.name: Pathik Surwey
characters.description: 20 years ago, Pathik was in an accident that sent him across the Multiverse.

characters.name: Stella Night
characters.description: Stella gained her superpowers in a lab accident, one day, but she wasn't the only one.
A mysterious superhero who, one day, emerged from the skies. He doesn't even know his name, so we gave him one; Exxtraman.

universes.name: Infinity Universe
universes.description: A timeless and enigmatic world, revered by multiversal travelers as a central hub of existence.

universes.name: Unreachable Universe
universes.description: A distant universe, almost unreachable, where humans coexist with enigmatic, unknown entities.

universes.name: First Universe
universes.description: Often referred to as 'The Super Universe', this highly advanced world is heavily controlled by sophisticated technology.

universes.name: Casual Universe
universes.description: A universe of hope, where ordinary humans live alongside superheroes and metahumans. When the Earth faces peril, heroic figures rise to combat dark forces.

universes.name: Inverted Universe
universes.description: A reality where the Americas have been divided into 'Americ' and 'Big Brazil,' with a small island, Little America, nestled between them.

universes.name: Maleficent Universe
universes.description: In this universe, the inhabitants of Earth are born without the ability to develop consciousness, creating a violent and chaotic environment.

universes.name: Desaturated Universe
universes.description: A universe with many similarities to a typical Earth, but the laws of physics are unpredictable, leading to strange occurrences.

universes.name: Unstable Universe
universes.description: Also called 'Glitch Earth,' this universe experiences constant changes in the laws of nature, making the world a chaotic and unpredictable place.

universes.name: Orange Skies Universe
universes.description: A surreal universe where the skies are perpetually orange, casting an otherworldly glow on the inhabitants of Earth and the Amber Moon, a mysterious celestial body.

universes.name: Red Realm
universes.description: This is a universe where every element is bathed in a constant red hue.

universes.name: Cartoon Universe
universes.description: A zany universe where everything is saturated in vibrant color, and the laws of nature follow absurd, cartoonish logic.

universes.name: Stone Earth
universes.description: A universe where powerful magicians once turned the entire Earth to stone, leaving behind a world of petrified landscapes.

universes.name: The Manaverse
universes.description: A universe where the weather in space directly affects the planet's environment.

universes.name: Future Universe
universes.description: A futuristic Earth, inhabited by evolved species and humans who have adapted to advanced technology and changed environments.

universes.name: Young Universe
universes.description: Known as Red n Blue Earth, this universe exudes a vibrant youthful energy.

universes.name: Old Universe
universes.description: A long-forgotten universe, where Earth is now a dead world, with only the remnants of vibrant hues remaining.
